title: YouTube Embed Shortcode Plugin
description: This plugin introduces a YouTube shortcode to your micro.blog, enabling you to showcase your YouTube videos using an embedded player. By employing the format {{< youtube VIDEO_ID >}}, you can seamlessly incorporate an embedded YouTube Player into your blog posts. The development of this functionality is rooted in the works of Steve Layton, as seen at https://github.com/shindakun/mbplugin-bandcamp/
